summary.position: Associate Senior Lecturer (Tenure Track) in AI for Software Engineering
summary.research_focus: Using and developing (generative) AI to improve software development processes and the quality of software artefacts.

research.description: Conduct research in software engineering, apply for external research funding, lead and develop research activities.
research.emphasis: At least 60% of the employment focused on research.

teaching.description: Deliver lectures, develop courses at undergraduate and graduate levels, supervise degree and project work, and doctoral students.

eligibility.requirements: Completed a doctoral degree or equivalent scientific competence.
eligibility.preference: Candidates awarded a doctoral degree or equivalent competence no more than five years prior to the application deadline.
eligibility.special_conditions: Consideration for those with earlier degrees due to illness, parental leave, or similar circumstances.
